comments:
STEPS:
1. use build M4-N20060728-1650 with lib 7.0.1
2. create a new cp cpA and extend an existing cp (with activities) into cpA
3. do a local replacement with deep copy on one of the green activities
4. open ADD for that ADD
results=> ADD is messed up (problem 1)
5. browse cpA
results=> the activity with local rep+deep copy is not displayed (problem 2)
6. default sync on that activity
results=> get exception (problem 3)
".......
An error has occurred. Click Details for more information.
  java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.epf.library.edit.process.command.SynchronizeCommand.getConfigurator(SynchronizeCommand.java:451)
	at org.eclipse.epf.library.edit.process.command.SynchronizeCommand.addToDeleteList(SynchronizeCommand.java:465)
	at org.eclipse.epf.library.edit.process.command.SynchronizeCommand.addToDeleteList(SynchronizeCommand.java:471)
	at org.eclipse.epf.library.edit.process.command.SynchronizeCommand.doInitialize(SynchronizeCommand.java:142)
	at org.eclipse.epf.library.edit.process.command.SynchronizeCommand.initilize(SynchronizeCommand.java:200)
	at org.eclipse.epf.authoring.ui.actions.ProcessAutoSynchronizeAction$2.run(ProcessAutoSynchronizeAction.java:175)
	at org.eclipse.epf.library.edit.ui.UserInteractionHelper$10.run(UserInteractionHelper.java:755)
	at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run(ModalContext.java:113)
......."
Process Package of the deep-copy did not get added to the super activity.
closed it as verified by QA.
